t: Resiliency - AWS Well-Architected Framework
s: A resilient workload not only recovers, but recovers in an amount of time that is desired. This is often called a recovery time objective (RTO). Within a workload, there is often a desire to not degrade, but to be capable of servicing the workload's requests during the recovery of a component.

t: Why some retail has been resilient against Amazon | Retail Dive
s: October 28, 2024 - Yet, in many U.S. cities and towns, certain stores seem to be thriving. Bicycles, photo equipment, record stores, resale — even, of all things, Amazon’s first category of books — are among those that have been quite resilient in the last couple of decades.
